text: Di gata tuan peue lom tapeugah Takheun Ibrahim deungon Ismail Ishak lagi Yaâ€˜qob pih sudah Ngon aneuk cuco ureueng nyan lagi Bandum Yahudi meunan tapeugah Got pih Nasrani takheun ureuengnyan Sulet that kaman narit nyang salah Peue gata leubeh nibak Hadharat Gata carong that sang-sang tapeugah Soe leubeh lalem nibak buet gata Tasom beurita sang-sang bak Allah Di Tuhan han tom laloe meusiat Buet gata meuhat Neungieng le Allah
